name: Real-time Order Notify
author: WapiWP

sections.description:
Stay on top of your WooCommerce orders with Real-time Order Notify. Get instant notifications via WhatsApp and never miss a customer order again. Keep your business running smoothly with this must-have plugin.

Note: To use the Real-time Order Notify plugin, you will need to have an API Key.

You can acquire an API Key from https://wapiwp.com/kayit.php in order to use the Real-time Order Notify plugin.

Tags: WooCommerce Order Alert,Instant Order Notification,WhatsApp Order Notification,WooCommerce plugin,Order tracking,Customer satisfaction,Business efficiency,Real-time notifications,Order management

Privacy Policy

https://wapiwp.com/PrivacyPolicy.html
sections.installation:
• Go to PLUGINS/ADD NEW and search for Real-time Order Notify or upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/ directory via FTP.
  • Activate the plugin from the Plugins section.
  • Enter your phone number in the “Admin Phone Number” field in the format 9053xxxxxxxxx.
  • Add credit on the credit adding page and enter your Real-time Order Notify API KEY.
sections.faq:
Do I need an API KEY to use the plugin?

Yes, you will need an API KEY to use the plugin.

How can I get an API KEY?

You can register and get your API KEY from https://wapiwp.com/kayit.php

How should the plugin settings be?

You can access the Real-time Order Notify Options tab in the Real-time Order Notify screen located in the Wp-admin Panel.

Plugin Settings

In this section, enter your phone number (with country code) in the “Admin Phone Number” field.
Enter the API KEY that you obtained from https://wapiwp.com/kayit.php

Click the “Update Options” button and save your settings.
